minuwangoda adhyapana kalapaya thula dipthimath pasalak wana minuwangoda janadhipathi widyalaya me wana wita dawantha sanwardhanayak kara yana gamane manpeth eli peheli karamin siti.wasara 31 kata pera parlimenthu manthri isad siriwardhana saha benat gunasekara yana mathithumanlage dadi kapawimen kala kriyawaliyaka prathipalayak lesa aarambha wu janadhipathi widyalaya eda meda thura gamane adhyapana, kridawa, winaya aadi siyalu angawalin kalapaye anek pasal abhibawa idiriyen sitiyi.bahutharayak shishyathwalabhi sisun igenuma labana me pasale sama wasarakama adhyapana anshaya osse samanya pela ha usas pela prathipala ihala mattamaka pawathi.sama wasarakama samanya pela wibhagaye di idiripath wana siyalu sisunma pahe samath wena athara me wasare ee 09 labagath sankhyawa 06 k wiya.2009 usas pela prathipala anuwa widyalaya thula itha sarthaka ayurin wanija anshaya haraha 48 deneku da, kala anshaya haraha 08 deneku da, ha widya anshayen 05 deneku da wishwawidyalayata piwisime waram labagena thibe.me pasala 1999 okthobar masa 28 wani dina ‚Äújanadhipathi widyalaya‚Äù lesin nam kirima haraha widyalaya handinwimata da sarthaka namayak labu bawa dakwiya hakiya.

shri lankan guwan niyamuwage wada thahanam bimath guwan niyamuwa warada piligani nawa wasara udawata aasannayedi kalgari hidi yanayata godawu gronyich hata siya kabaya randawimata mahath parishramayak darannata wu athara adhikaranaye di kiyawunu prakashayaka dakwune yanayen pitawana lesa sahaya niyamuwa kala illima bahara karamin ohu niyamu aasanayata wu bawaya.ohuge nila andumehi piyasara salakuna udu yatikuru kota palandawa thibu athara hotal kamaraya thulin mathpan bothalayak da sogena thibini.sanwing nam adu mila guwan gaman sapayana samagamakata ayath wu guwan yanaya pasuwa kalgari sita meksikowe kankun bala piyasara kale wenath niyamuwaku yedawimen pasuwaya. 100ta adhika magin pirisak ema guwan gamanata ekwa sitiyaha.me sambandhayen kala wimasimata sanwing guwan samagama prathichara dakwa nothibini.
